price: 7. ¿Acaso no ven cómo hacemos que crezcan en la tierra todo tipo de nobles especies?
arabic: أَوَلَمۡ يَرَوۡاْ إِلَى ٱلۡأَرۡضِ كَمۡ أَنۢبَتۡنَا فِيهَا مِن كُلِّ زَوۡجٖ كَرِيمٍ

version.title: Spanish Translation (Latin America) - Noor International
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Spanish (Latin America) by Noor International (Ed. 2017)

meta.transliteration: awalam yaraw ilā al-arḍi kam anbatnā fīhā min kulli zawjin karīmin
